backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two UI styling features and the files they affect.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and content of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables for color, layout, and dark mode, applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the RoseDayPage as the sole app content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining Rose Day color tokens, dark mode variants, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/RoseDayPage.tsx: Full Rose Day landing page with themed text, animations, floating hearts, and a chibi illustration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content paths, custom colors, fonts, radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the Valentine-themed site, feature requirements, design notes, known issues, and current fix request status.
